Hazard: Emits cynaide gas, melts, bursts into flame.

Notes: Also known as Nitrile rubber, Buna-N, Perbunan, acrylonitrile butadiene rubber, and NBR
No-Odor Laser Rubber (RPO 035) and Low Odor Laser Rubber (RUS 001)

Hazard: Will not cut, reflects laser beam.

Prohibited Material: Silicone conformal coating spray from MG Chemicals
Speedball Art Speedy Cut, Speedy Cut Easy and Speedy Carve
